thread.title: BRIEF-Landis&Gyr Group ‍Comments On US Tax Reform​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Landis&Gyr Group ‍Comments On US Tax Reform​

organizations.name: brief-landis&gyr group ‍comments on us tax reform

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - LANDIS&GYR GROUP AG:
* ‍COMMENTS ON US TAX REFORM​ * ‍REVALUATION IS EXPECTED TO DECREASE COMPANY‘S NET DEFERRED TAX LIABILITY BY APPROXIMATELY USD 22 MILLION​
* ‍FROM JANUARY 1, 2018, LANDIS+GYR WILL ALSO INCUR LOWER US INCOME TAX EXPENSES​
* ‍DUE TO LOWER US INCOME TAX EXPENSES, EXPECTS INCREASE IN FREE CASH FLOW OF APPROX USD 15 - 20 MILLION PER ANNUM​ Source text - bit.ly/2ru9zhL Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
